snippet.title: Back to the Dawn Official Demo Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The free Back to the Dawn Demo  is playable now in English, Japanese, and Chinese. In this demo you will experience Thomas' first day in jail.

Back to the Dawn is a strategy prison-break cRPG. Play as the roving reporter Fox Thomas, who was framed and wrongly imprisoned. He has only 21 days to create his own way to survive, socialize, and collect evidence. Will he find his way out of the big house and go back to the dawn? I would tell you more but... Why don't you try it for yourself?
Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/17...
We would love to hear your voice about Demo and the whole game. You can join our Discord Server and follow our progress on social media.

Discord:https://discord.gg/tsCTtN37WD 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bttd_official 
Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/backtothedawngame
